ingredients: 1 small bulb fennel (about 10 ounces), fronds removed, cored, and thinly sliced with a mandoline or other handheld slicer (about 4 cups)
1/2 cup packed fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves and stems, finely chopped
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper
3/4 ounce Pecorino Romano cheese, shaved (about 1/4 cup)
